readable.content: A boy is lying down in midst of many soft toys , and spiderman quilt . A boy wearing a black shirt and khaki pants is laying down , and is surrounded by stuffed animals . A child laying in the midst of stuffed toys and blankets . A young boy lays in a bed of stuffed animals . Child laying down in the midst of stuffed animals including Mickey Mouse and Tigger
